text: Youxie ren shuo:“Women yi xin zhenzhule.” Dang tamen wei zhenzhu er shou pohai de shihou, tamen ba zhongren de pohai dangzuo zhenzhu de xingfa. Ruguo yuanzhu cong nimen de zhu jianglin, tamen biding shuo:“Women que shi yu nimen tong zai yiqi de.” Nandao zhenzhu bushi zhidao shiren de xiongjin de ma
